metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24379 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
WebDAV implementation in Yaws web server versions 1.81 to 2.0.7 isvulnerable to XXE injection.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24379` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

erlang-yapp - 2.0.8+dfsg-1
erlang-yaws - 2.0.8+dfsg-1
yaws - 2.0.8+dfsg-1
yaws-chat - 2.0.8+dfsg-1
yaws-mail - 2.0.8+dfsg-1
yaws-wiki - 2.0.8+dfsg-1
yaws-yapp - 2.0.8+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yaws package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.8+dfsg-1').
